name: Space Junk Patrol
description: Guide your ship through crowded space to clean up space debris, repair failing satellites, and shoo away pesky aliens. And watch out for those asteroids! This is a room-scale arcade-style game requiring an HTC Vive VR Headset to play.
minimum_requirements: OS: 7 Processor: Intel i5-4590 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 / AMD R9 290 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: 7 Processor: Intel i7-4770 Memory: 15 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 980 / AMD R9 390x DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
